product_name: Novara Little Carema Bike Skort - Girls'
long_description: The Novara Little Carema bike skort will have her riding in cute comfort with a stretchy fit and padded liner shorts. Skirt and liner shorts feature a touch of spandex for comfortable, 4-way stretch. Chamois pad helps cushion and protect contact areas. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Hidden slip pocket on front left leg of shorts offers convenient storage for a small energy bar or gel. Reflective logo enhances visibility in low light.
short_description: The Novara Little Carema bike skort will have her riding in cute comfort with a stretchy fit and padded liner shorts.
